attributes.action: Ban the use of prong collars and pain inflicting devices and training methods
attributes.additional_details: The government has recently made it illegal to use shock collars in dogs, devices such as prong collars are as dangerous for the wellbeing of the dog.
attributes.background: The use of prong collars has shown to inflict pain on dogs, we should not be using pain as a method of training. All devices such as prong collars should be banned along with other devices and training methods that inflict pain upon animals.
